argument.name: time_format
argument.description: Optional. Default = "hh:mm:ss". The format for the time value. Character

page.description: Returns the current GTM time on the system clock in the format 'HH:MM:SS'.
page.discussion: GMT() returns Greenwich Mean Time as a Formatted_Short_Time. For information on the optional Format_String parameter, see Time Format Codes.
